Shane Biggs = { Aspiring Web Developer };

Follow my evolution from n00b to Web Developer as I attend Dev Bootcamp in San Francisco!

def web_developer
	sb = shane_biggs
	db = dev_bootcamp
	sb + db
end

puts web_developer
